00044 class MIXIM_API BaseApplLayer : public BaseLayer
00045 {
00046 private:
00049   BaseApplLayer(const BaseApplLayer&);
00052   BaseApplLayer& operator=(const BaseApplLayer&);
00053

00056   enum BaseApplMessageKinds {
00059     LAST_BASE_APPL_MESSAGE_KIND = 25000,
00060   };
00062   enum BaseApplControlKinds {
00065     LAST_BASE_APPL_CONTROL_KIND = 25500,
00066   };
00067 protected:
00071   int headerLength;
00072

00074   //Module_Class_Members(BaseApplLayer, BaseLayer, 0);

00076     : BaseLayer()
00077     , headerLength(0)
00078   {}
00079   BaseApplLayer(unsigned stacksize)
00080     : BaseLayer(stacksize)
00081     , headerLength(0)
00082   {}
00083 
00085   virtual void initialize(int);
00086 
00087 protected:
00098 
00105   virtual void handleSelfMsg(cMessage* msg) {
00106     EV << "BaseApplLayer: handleSelfMsg not redefined; delete msg\n";
00107     delete msg;
00108   };
00109 
00119   virtual void handleLowerMsg(cMessage* msg) {
00120     EV << "BaseApplLayer: handleLowerMsg not redefined; delete msg\n";
00121     delete msg;
00122   };
00123 
00130   virtual void handleLowerControl(cMessage* msg) {
00131     EV << "BaseApplLayer: handleLowerControl not redefined; delete msg\n";
00132     delete msg;
00133   };
00134 
00140   virtual void handleUpperMsg(cMessage *msg) {
00141     assert(false);
00142     opp_error("Application has no upper layers!");
00143     delete msg;
00144   }
00145 
00147   virtual void handleUpperControl(cMessage *msg) {
00148     assert(false);
00149     opp_error("Application has no upper layers!");
00150     delete msg;
00151   }
00152 
00156   void sendDelayedDown(cMessage *, simtime_t_cref);
00157 
00163   virtual LAddress::L3Type myApplAddr() const {
00164     return LAddress::L3Type( getNode()->getIndex() );
00165   };

00167 };
